properties.description:
소셜 고객 의견 데이터 Top키워드 블로그
수동

activities.name: API REQ INFO
activities.description: API 호출 정보를 가져오기 위해 설정 파일에서 Date을 읽어옵니다.

query.value:
select keyword     
        ,exclude_keyword
        ,include_keyword
        ,include_keyword_and
        ,case when include_keyword_and is not null then '('||include_keyword_and||')&('||include_keyword||')'
              else include_keyword
          end include_keyword_api
   from  cd_ods.tb_global_news_keyword

delete from cd_ods.tb_global_news_data where date between '@{variables('date')}' and '@{variables('date2')}';

insert into cd_ods.tb_global_news_data
(
 "date" 
	,gubun
	,keyword
	,include_keyword
	,exclude_keyword 
	,include_keyword_and
	,title
	,url
	,writername 
	,writerrealname 
	,documentdate
	,select_include_keyword
)
     select  a.date
	,a.gubun
	,a.keyword
	,a.include_keyword
	,a.exclude_keyword 
	,a.include_keyword_and
	,a.title
	,a.url
	,a.writername 
	,a.writerrealname 
	,a.documentdate
            ,array_to_string ( array_agg(distinct a.select_inculde_keyword),',' ) as select_include_keyword            
        from (
		         select "date" 
						,gubun	
						,keyword
						,include_keyword
						,exclude_keyword 
						,include_keyword_and
						,title
						,url
						,writername 
						,writerrealname 
						,documentdate
					    ,regexp_matches(title||' '||content , replace(include_keyword,'||','|') ,'g') as select_inculde_keyword			   
						from cd_ods.tb_global_news_data_temp					
					where date between '@{variables('date')}' and '@{variables('date2')}'
					 and replace(writername,' ','') not in
								 (
								  '일간스포츠'
								  , 'MBC연예'
								  , '오마이뉴스'
								  , '코메디닷컴'
								  , '스포티비뉴스'
								  , '연합뉴스TN'
								  , '스타뉴스'
								  , 'OSEN'
								 )
				--	and title ='백화점부터 도서관까지…기능성 천장재 도입 사례 확산'
                 ) a
     group by  a.date
	,a.gubun
	,a.keyword
	,a.include_keyword
	,a.exclude_keyword 
	,a.include_keyword_and
	,a.title
	,a.url
	,a.writername 
	,a.writerrealname 
	,a.documentdate    ;            
                 
select 1 as su;
